message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8800.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9800.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better proposal. I would like to counteroffer at $9200.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9200. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $9600.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Let me try one last time. I would like to counteroffer at $9400.
Thank you for your last offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9400. I'm willing to make one final compromise and offer the product to you for $9700.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $9550.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9550. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $9750.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $9650.
